title: A British trade union
creator_credit: Anvil Films and British Information Services
brief_description: An account of the work of a shop steward in a furniture factory is used to illustrate how a British trade union functions. The film gives a comprehensive outline of union organisation, explaining the relationship between employees and their union and between the union, at several levels, and the employers.
